text: Ara tomadera madhye yara mrtyubarana karabe ebam nijedera striderake chere yabe, takhana se stridera kartabya halo nijeke cara masa dasa dina paryanta apeksa kariye rakha. Tarapara yakhana iddata purna kare nebe, takhana nijera byapare niti sangata byabastha nile kona papa ne'i. Ara tomadera yabatiya kajera byapare'i allahara abagati rayeche.
